pathology.description: Describes the pathology of the sample or type of control. If different from healthy, this SHOULD be specified.

sample_id.description: The identifier of the sample from which the data is acquired, e.g., 'slice02', or 'cell4'. The combination of sample_id and participant_id MUST be unique.

sample_type.description: Biosample type defined by ENCODE Biosample Type.

derived_from.description: sample-<label> entity from which a sample is derived, e.g., sample-cell02 is derived from sample-slice01.
